===Pronunciation===

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きゅうしゅう}}
# [[suction]]; [[absorption]]; [[assimilation]]
# [[merger]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|吸収剤}} (''kyūshūzai''): an absorbent
* {{l|ja|吸収性}} (''kyūshūsei''): absorbability, absorbency
* {{l|ja|吸収体}} (''kyūshūtai''): absorbent
* {{l|ja|吸収力}} (''kyūshūryoku''): absorbing power
* {{l|ja|吸収合併}} (''kyūshū gappei''): merger, takeover
* {{l|ja|吸収線量}} (''kyūshū senryō''): absorbed dose (as of radiation)
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|吸収不良症候群}} (''kyūshū furyō shōkōgun''): malabsorption syndrome
* {{l|ja|結腸吸収}} (''ketchō kyūshū''): colon absorption
* {{l|ja|星間吸収}} (''seikan kyūshū''): interstellar absorption
* {{l|ja|高分子吸収体}} (''kōbunshi kyōshūtai''): high polymer absorbent
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素吸収源}} (''ni-sanka tanso kyūshū-gen''): carbon sink
* {{l|ja|二酸化炭素の吸収源}} (''ni-sanka tanso no kyūshū-gen''): carbon sink
